verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: I have not much to offer You newline not mere what You deserve newline but still I come because Your cross newline has placed in me my worth

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Oh Christ my King of sympathy newline whose wounds secure my peace newline Your grace extends to call me friend newline Your mercy sets me free

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: And I know I'm weak newline I know I'm unworthy newline to call upon Your name newline but because of grace newline because of Your mercy newline I stand here unashamed

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: I can't explain this kind of love newline I'm humbled and amazed that You'd come down from heaven's heights newline and greet me face to face

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: Here I am at Your feet in my brokeness complete
